alert.note: Alert for Parke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 27 at 11:36AM EST until February 27 at 11:45AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM EST FOR EASTERN PARKE COUNTY... At 1135 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rockville, or 15 miles northeast of Terre Haute, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Rockville around 1140 AM EST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Judson. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EST for west central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
